entry.title: Bitcoin Protocol Specification
entry.summary: On July 2nd, 2014, Isidor Zeuner reached out to Krzysztof Okupski to commend him on his work on a Bitcoin reference document, which can be found on enetium.com/resources/Bitcoin.pdf. Zeuner suggested putting the document source under version control to facilitate tracking future protocol improvements. On July 7th, 2014, JMOlmos requested translation assistance via email. The email thread was sent to the Bitcoin-development mailing list hosted by SourceForge.
